Job Posting:174257 - Position: W26 Graph Engineer- Co-op (Contractor) 174257B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/15/2025 09:00 AM Through UBC Science Co-op 10/09/2025 11:29 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Province / State Country Aerospike BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 Graph Engineer- Co-op (Contractor) 174257B Co-op Position Vancouver, BC Canada 8 months Fully Remote CAD 40.0 per hour for 35 Major List Note: Students will be hired as an independent contractor. (a) Assist in the design, development, and maintenance of our TinkerPop graph database implementation. (b) Support optimization and enhancement of database query performance and capabilities. (c) Collaborate with team members to design new features with an end-user perspective. (d) Participate in building performance tests, cloud deployments, and integration enhancements. (e) Perform testing and debugging to ensure system reliability and performance standards. (f) Work on our public examples repository https://github.com/aerospike/aerospike-graph Job Requirements • Java, Python, and/or NodeJS experience is preferred. Experience with Graph databases, databases in general, or distributed computing is a plus. • N/A Citizenship Requirement APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Optional Address Cover Letter to Lyndon Bauto Special Application Instructions Cover letters not mandatory unless there is something relevant you would like to highlight
